value.title: Review Power Query with Query Diagnostics tool - Power BI Desktop update October 2019
value.excerpt: Powerweek is back!!! and in today's video I will review the Power BI desktop update feature released in october 2019 called Query diagnostics. I will tell you what I like about it and what needs to be improved imo.  Link to MS documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/power-query/querydiagnostics

value.title: Copy and paste visuals in Power BI | Power Week 11.18 - Power BI Desktop Update November 2018
value.excerpt: With the Power BI Desktop Update November 2018 release, you can now copy a visual either through the visual’s context menu or through the standard Ctrl+C keyboard shortcut and paste it into another report through Ctrl+V.  This is very useful for anyone who builds and updates multiple reports frequently.

value.title: Expand and collapse rows in a matrix | Power Week 11.18 - Power BI Desktop Update Nov
value.excerpt: Now after the Power BI desktop update November 2018, you can add +/- buttons to the row headers through the formatting pane under the row headers card.
